author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM HONE SOUTHEAST OF THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM HONE SOUTHEAST OF THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 7:10 PM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Hone was located near 18.2, -154.7
 with movement W at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.
